channel.title: How to access sites that try to force an app down your throat when you're on Android
channel.description:
Short article, but sometimes you'll find that sites force you to download an app to access certain content, for example Facebook, 9GAG etc.
This is easily solved:
Download Firefox on Android from the APP store In firefox change the useragent string. HOW: http://www.howtogeek.com/113439/how-to-change-your-browsers-user-agent-without-installing-any-extensions/ Scroll down to Firefox, I believe the Chrome one doesn't work.
